_setImplementation(address,bool,bytes).code: function _setImplementation(address implementation_, bool allowResign, bytes becomeImplementationData) external nonpayable

implementation_.description: The address of the new implementation for delegation

allowResign.description: Flag to indicate whether to call _resignImplementation on the old implementation

becomeImplementationData.description: The encoded bytes data to be passed to _becomeImplementation

_setImplementation(address,bool,bytes).notice: Called by the admin to update the implementation of the delegator
